snippet: The McLaren MP4-12C is designed around the premise that high performance depends on low weight. And at under 3,000 pounds, the car easily runs the quarter-mile in less than 11 seconds.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2012 McLaren MP4-12C sports car.
lead_paragraph: The McLaren MP4-12C is designed around the premise that high performance depends on low weight. And at under 3,000 pounds, the car easily runs the quarter-mile in less than 11 seconds.

headline.seo: Accused of Understatement, but Now Acquitted
headline.main: Accused of Understatement, but Acquitted on All Counts
headline.print_headline: Accused of Understatement, But Acquitted on All Counts
